mil5.1.3:1.2_1: khattiyakumārā bhaddiyo ca anuruddho ca ānando ca bhagu ca kimilo ca devadatto ca upālikappako sattamo
mil5.1.3:1.2_2: abhisambuddhe satthari sakyakulānandajanane bhagavantaṁ anupabbajantā nikkhamiṁsu,
mil5.1.3:1.4_7: bhikkhu pakatatto samānasaṁvāsako samānasīmāyaṁ ṭhito saṅghaṁ bhindatī”ti.
mil5.1.3:2.3_3: saṅghaṁ bhinditvā kappaṁ niraye paccissatī’ti, tena hi,
mil5.1.3:2.3_5: buddho kāruṇiko anukampako hitesī sabbasattānaṁ ahitaṁ apanetvā hitamupadahatīti yaṁ vacanaṁ,
mil5.1.3:2.4_5: anāgate addhāne tayā sadisā buddhimanto bhikkhū dullabhā bhavissanti,
mil5.1.3:3.1_3: bhagavā sabbaññutañāṇena devadattassa gatiṁ olokento addasa devadattaṁ āpāyikaṁ kammaṁ āyūhitvā anekāni
mil5.1.3:3.1_4: kappakoṭisatasahassāni nirayena nirayaṁ vinipātena vinipātaṁ gacchantaṁ,
mil5.1.3:3.1_5: taṁ bhagavā sabbaññutañāṇena jānitvā imassa apariyantakataṁ kammaṁ mama sāsane pabbajitassa pariyantakataṁ bhavissati,
mil5.1.3:3.1_7: apabbajitopi ayaṁ moghapuriso kappaṭṭhiyameva kammaṁ āyūhissatīti kāruññena devadattaṁ pabbājesī”ti.
mil5.1.3:4.1_5: yaṁ so paṭhamaṁ dukkhaṁ datvā pacchā sukhaṁ upadahatī”ti?
mil5.1.3:4.3_0: Yathā, mahārāja, mātāpitaro nāma vadhitvāpi pātayitvāpi puttānaṁ hitameva upadahanti;
mil5.1.3:4.4_8: yena yena yogena sattānaṁ guṇavuḍḍhi hoti,
mil5.1.3:4.4_9: tena tena yogena sabbasattānaṁ hitameva upadahati.
mil5.1.3:4.5_2: gihibhūto samāno nirayasaṁvattanikaṁ bahuṁ pāpakammaṁ katvā anekāni kappakoṭisatasahassāni nirayena nirayaṁ
mil5.1.3:4.5_3: vinipātena vinipātaṁ gacchanto bahuṁ dukkhaṁ vedayissati,
mil5.1.3:4.5_4: taṁ bhagavā jānamāno kāruññena devadattaṁ pabbājesi,
mil5.1.3:4.5_5: ‘mama sāsane pabbajitassa dukkhaṁ pariyantakataṁ bhavissatī’ti kāruññena garukaṁ dukkhaṁ lahukaṁ akāsi.
mil5.1.3:5.1_1: dhanayasasiriñātibalena balavā puriso attano ñātiṁ vā mittaṁ vā raññā garukaṁ daṇḍaṁ dhārentaṁ attano
mil5.1.3:5.1_2: bahuvissatthabhāvena samatthatāya garukaṁ daṇḍaṁ lahukaṁ akāsi;
mil5.1.3:5.2_1: bhagavā bahūni kappakoṭisatasahassāni dukkhaṁ vedayamānaṁ devadattaṁ pabbājetvā sīlasamādhipaññāvimuttibalasamatthabhāvena
mil5.1.3:6.1_0: Yathā vā pana, mahārāja, kusalo bhisakko sallakatto garukaṁ rogaṁ balavosadhabalena lahukaṁ karoti;
mil5.1.3:6.2_1: bahūni kappakoṭisatasahassāni dukkhaṁ vedayamānaṁ devadattaṁ bhagavā rogaññutāya pabbājetvā kāruññabalo
mil5.1.3:6.3_1: bhagavā bahuvedanīyaṁ devadattaṁ appavedanīyaṁ karonto kiñci apuññaṁ āpajjeyyā”ti?
mil5.1.3:6.4_0: “Na kiñci, bhante, apuññaṁ āpajjeyya antamaso gaddūhanamattampī”ti.
mil5.1.3:6.5_0: “Imampi kho, mahārāja, kāraṇaṁ atthato sampaṭiccha, yena kāraṇena bhagavā devadattaṁ pabbājesi.
mil5.1.3:7.1_0: Aparampi, mahārāja, uttariṁ kāraṇaṁ suṇohi, yena kāraṇena bhagavā devadattaṁ pabbājesi.
mil5.1.3:7.3_0: Tamenaṁ rājā evaṁ vadeyya ‘tena hi, bhaṇe,
mil5.1.3:7.3_1: imaṁ coraṁ bahinagaraṁ nīharitvā āghātane sīsaṁ chindathā’ti.
mil5.1.3:7.4_0: ‘Evaṁ, devā’ti kho te rañño paṭissutvā taṁ bahinagaraṁ nīharitvā āghātanaṁ nayeyyuṁ.
mil5.1.3:7.5_0: Tamenaṁ passeyya kocideva puriso rañño santikā laddhavaro laddhayasadhanabhogo ādeyyavacano balavicchitakārī,
mil5.1.3:7.5_1: so tassa kāruññaṁ katvā te purise evaṁ vadeyya ‘alaṁ, bho,
mil5.1.3:7.5_3: tena hi bho imassa hatthaṁ vā pādaṁ vā chinditvā jīvitaṁ rakkhatha,
mil5.1.3:7.5_4: ahametassa kāraṇā rañño santike paṭivacanaṁ karissāmī’ti.
mil5.1.3:7.6_0: Te tassa balavato vacanena tassa corassa hatthaṁ vā pādaṁ vā chinditvā jīvitaṁ rakkheyyuṁ.
mil5.1.3:7.7_0: Api nu kho so, mahārāja, puriso evaṁ kārī tassa corassa kiccakārī assā”ti?
mil5.1.3:7.8_0: “Jīvitadāyako so, bhante, puriso tassa corassa, jīvite dinne kiṁ tassa akataṁ nāma atthī”ti?
mil5.1.3:7.9_0: “Yā pana hatthapādacchedane vedanā, so tāya vedanāya kiñci apuññaṁ āpajjeyyā”ti?
mil5.1.3:7.10_2: jīvitadāyako pana puriso na kiñci apuññaṁ āpajjeyyā”ti.
mil5.1.3:7.11_1: bhagavā kāruññena devadattaṁ pabbājesi ‘mama sāsane pabbajitassa dukkhaṁ pariyantakataṁ bhavissatī’ti.
mil5.1.3:7.12_0: Pariyantakatañca, mahārāja, devadattassa dukkhaṁ, devadatto, mahārāja, maraṇakāle—
mil5.1.3:9.2_1: cha koṭṭhāse kate kappe atikkante paṭhamakoṭṭhāse saṅghaṁ bhindi,
mil5.1.3:9.2_2: pañca koṭṭhāse niraye paccitvā tato muccitvā aṭṭhissaro nāma paccekabuddho bhavissati.
mil5.1.3:9.3_0: Api nu kho so, mahārāja, bhagavā evaṁ kārī devadattassa kiccakārī assā”ti?
mil5.1.3:9.4_4: kiṁ tathāgatena devadattassa akataṁ nāma atthī”ti?
mil5.1.3:9.5_1: devadatto saṅghaṁ bhinditvā niraye dukkhavedanaṁ vedayati,
mil5.1.3:9.5_2: api nu kho bhagavā tatonidānaṁ kiñci apuññaṁ āpajjeyyā”ti?
mil5.1.3:9.6_3: dukkhapariyantakārako satthā na kiñci apuññaṁ āpajjatī”ti.
mil5.1.3:9.7_0: “Imampi kho tvaṁ, mahārāja, kāraṇaṁ atthato sampaṭiccha, yena kāraṇena bhagavā devadattaṁ pabbājesi.
mil5.1.3:10.1_0: Aparampi, mahārāja, uttariṁ kāraṇaṁ suṇohi, yena kāraṇena bhagavā devadattaṁ pabbājesi.
mil5.1.3:10.2_2: antosallaṁ susiragataṁ pubbaruhirasampuṇṇaṁ vaṇaṁ vūpasamento vaṇamukhaṁ kakkhaḷatikhiṇakhārakaṭukena
mil5.1.3:10.2_4: paripaccitvā mudubhāvamupagataṁ satthena vikantayitvā ḍahati salākāya,
mil5.1.3:10.3_0: “Na hi, bhante, hitacitto sotthikāmo tāni kiriyāni karotī”ti.
mil5.1.3:10.4_1: tatonidānaṁ so bhisakko sallakatto kiñci apuññaṁ āpajjeyyā”ti?
mil5.1.3:10.5_1: sotthikāmo bhisakko sallakatto tāni kiriyāni karoti,
mil5.1.3:10.6_0: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, kāruññena bhagavā devadattaṁ pabbājesi dukkhaparimuttiyā.
mil5.1.3:11.1_0: Aparampi, mahārāja, uttariṁ kāraṇaṁ suṇohi, yena kāraṇena bhagavā devadattaṁ pabbājesi.
mil5.1.3:11.2_2: athaññataro puriso tassa hitakāmo sotthikāmo tiṇhena kaṇṭakena vā satthamukhena vā samantato chinditvā paggharantena lohitena taṁ kaṇṭakaṁ nīhareyya,
mil5.1.3:11.3_0: “Na hi, bhante, hitakāmo so, bhante, puriso sotthikāmo taṁ kaṇṭakaṁ nīharati.
mil5.1.3:11.4_0: Sace so, bhante, taṁ kaṇṭakaṁ na nīhareyya, maraṇaṁ vā so tena pāpuṇeyya maraṇamattaṁ vā dukkhan”ti.
mil5.1.3:11.5_0: “Evameva kho, mahārāja, tathāgato kāruññena devadattaṁ pabbājesi dukkhaparimuttiyā.
mil5.1.3:12.2_2: hetū imāni ca kāraṇāni na sakkā aññena sandassetuṁ aññatra tavādisena buddhimatā”ti.
